    public class MusicActivity<pubic>
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Main Music Activity Class Where Music Data Gets,Set and Played
    Helping Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qr88MxPijN4
    Helping Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZRffTnk8ug8&list=PL9vy4y29rrd4x5pAbowit8gpjsXAai0yF

    Helping Source https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/media-apps/volume-and-earphones

    2.0
    Author:

      This Function creates the Notification Player it takes 2 Drawabels and then Creates a notificarion with using NotificationCompat MediaStyle.

      A setter for the likeToggle which acts as a flag to weather the Track is liked or no
      void setMusicPlayerComponents(int position, java.lang.String sName, java.lang.String aName, java.lang.String pName, java.lang.String hName, java.lang.String iURL, java.lang.String mURL, boolean isliked, java.lang.String id)
      A Funtion responsible to set the Music Data and Plays it using Android Media Player
      It gets the needed data and assigns it then sets the path for the music to stream and play
      The Whole Music Playing is all about this Function after setting the data media player is prepared and then started
      Also inside the function seekbar listener is called to detect when the user moves the seek bar and then seeks the music to the desired position
      handlers for seekbar and time changing are called also in function to keep updating.

      function that sets remaining time of playing

      StopTimer is a function Called by the Timer Fragment created and is called when the timer is reached to the assigned time and then stops the music and updates all components.

      This Function is Used to update the time and is called in the runnable.

      • onBackPressed

      • volumeinit

        public void volumeinit()

      • setMusicPlayerComponents

        public void setMusicPlayerComponents(int position,
                                     java.lang.String sName,
                                     java.lang.String aName,
                                     java.lang.String pName,
                                     java.lang.String hName,
                                     java.lang.String iURL,
                                     java.lang.String mURL,
                                     boolean isliked,
                                     java.lang.String id)
        A Funtion responsible to set the Music Data and Plays it using Android Media Player
        It gets the needed data and assigns it then sets the path for the music to stream and play
        The Whole Music Playing is all about this Function after setting the data media player is prepared and then started
        Also inside the function seekbar listener is called to detect when the user moves the seek bar and then seeks the music to the desired position
        handlers for seekbar and time changing are called also in function to keep updating.
        Parameters:
        position - position of the song playlist array
        sName - Song Name Parameter
        aName - Artist Name Parameter
        pName - Playlist Name Parameter
        hName - Hit Name Parameter
        iURL - Image Url to Set the photo in the assigned Image View
        mURL - Music Url to stream the music
        isliked - the song is liked or no
        id - id of the song

      • buttonPlayerAction

        public void buttonPlayerAction()
        A Function that listens to the user interaction with the Play/Pause Button changing the Image resource and then stops the music or starts it again.
        Also inside the function notification Player is updated to change the Play/pause icon also
        A Handler Remove Call Back is Also Called to stop/continue updating the music seekbar and the time
        Also the mainactivity widget is updated also

      • next

        public void next()
        a function that gets the next song and sets its data

      • prev

        public void prev()
        A function that gets the previous song and sets its data

      • stopTimer

        public void stopTimer()
        StopTimer is a function Called by the Timer Fragment created and is called when the timer is reached to the assigned time and then stops the music and updates all components.

      • receiveData

        public void receiveData()
        ReceiveData is a Function responsible for receiving the Track Data sent from MainActivitysha Class and then calls setMusicPlayerComponents Function to start the player.

      • drawableToBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap drawableToBitmap(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        A function reponsible to convert the drawable to Bitmap.
        This Function is used in the notification calling because the notification Large icon needs a bitmap but the music image is a drawable.
        So this function converts it to transform the Image to be able to be used in Notification.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The Drawable Image to be converted
        Returns:
        Returns a Bitmap Source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3035692/how-to-convert-a-drawable-to-a-bitmap

      • sendOnChannel2

        public void sendOnChannel2(android.view.View v,
                           int drawable,
                           int likeDrawable)
        This Function creates the Notification Player it takes 2 Drawabels and then Creates a notificarion with using NotificationCompat MediaStyle.
        This Function has 4 Actions like/previous/Play/next/dislike
        Inside the Fucntion the type for each action is set to be able to tell which action is pressed on and do a response in terms of the type
        Parameters:
        v -
        drawable - This Drawable is Play/Pause Button Image to be able to update the Image Resource every time
        likeDrawable - This Drawable is for the Like Button and it is used to update ethier it is liked or no and set the image resource. Source Took Things From : https://codinginflow.com/tutorials/android/notifications-notification-channels/part-4-bigpicturestyle-mediastyle Modified By : Ahmed Mahmoud Fawzi

      • getLikeToggle

        int getLikeToggle()
        A getter for the likeToggle which acts as a flag to weather the Track is liked or no
        Returns:

      • setLikeToggle

        void setLikeToggle(int a)
        A setter for the likeToggle which acts as a flag to weather the Track is liked or no
        Parameters:
        a - An integr either 1/0

      • showLikeToast

        public void showLikeToast(java.lang.String S)
        A toast that shows when the like button is pressed Indicating what happened now (added to liked or Removed )
        Parameters:
        S - A String for the Toast

      • buttonLikeAction

        public void buttonLikeAction()
        This Function is Called when a like button has been pressed.
        It sets the Player like Button and the notification like to either liked or unliked and it also sets the liktoggle flag to 1 which means that it is liked.
        I also show a toast using the showliketoast function.

      • updateTimeAndSeekbar

        private void updateTimeAndSeekbar()
        This Function is Used to update the time and is called in the runnable.
        It uses a object to MusicControl Class to transform the Milliseconds to Time for both the Current duration and the Total Duration.

      • setRemaining

        private void setRemaining(long a)
        function that sets remaining time of playing
        Parameters:
        a -
